name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Cloud Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in utilizing **GCP**, **Terraform**, and **Python** to develop and manage robust cloud architectures. Skilled in security practices including **Firewalls**, **VPC Service Controls**, and compliance standards such as **ISO 27001** and **DORA**, I ensure that applications are not only safe but also efficient in meeting regulatory requirements. My experience extends to infrastructure as code, utilizing **Terraform** for deployment automation, and establishing security baselines using **Cloud Armor** and **WAFs**.

Additionally, I possess strong programming skills in **Go** and have a solid background in cloud-native technologies. My previous roles involved leading teams in building enterprise platforms with an emphasis on microservices, event-driven systems, and CI/CD practices. I have also implemented data processing pipelines and machine learning workflows, leveraging tools like **n8n**, effectively driving the integration of intelligent automation into existing frameworks. My proficiency spans various technologies and frameworks, including **FastAPI**, **Django**, and **MLflow**, showcasing my versatility as a Full Stack Developer in driving high-performance solutions.
